review:
Dr. Nirali Dedhia is a great doctor! She explained everything to me in a very clear manner from the very first day. For First 3 months I was getting treated in private hospital in Dahisar where I was not happy with the Dr's appearance & *Treatment . I got Dr Nirali Dedhia's reference from one of my cousins so I viseted (SURANA HOSPITAL) & I was getting positive vibes after talking to her & getting good aperrance the way she was explaining how to take care how to follow the prega days (diet, sleep, workout etc) I completed my remaining 6 months checkup of prega days very happily without any negative vibes.  Suddenly On 14 December morning I was getting badly pain in my stomach where my delivery date was 24 December 2020 so I hav to rush to hospital for checkup arround 10. 00AM. Dr Nirali Dedhia  completed her checkup  & took a great &very good decision of doing my C section surgery because my condition was getting critical me n my child was in danger. Me & My family was so happy she took this decision n completed the surgery successfully n gave us  good news  to my family of baby boy  n mother both are safe n healthy.  Dr Nirali Dedhia I am so happy & thank you for u kind love n treatment along with Dr NIRALI the team and hospital staff wer also to friendly and caring thank you very very much Dr Nirali Dedhia & TEAM &   special thanks to *NURSE. DHANASHREE PATIL (SURANA HOSPITAL & STAFF).
I will highly recommend to all mothers & family do visit Dr. Nirali Dedhia as I had a great & healthy experience ‚ù§Ô∏è
Thank you once again Dr Nirali Dedhia for giving me n my child a healthy n new life
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Gynae advice,Gynae Problems,Caesarean Section (C Section),Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Gynecologic Laparoscopy,
review: I had reached out to her when I was Covid positive for my delivery via my family. She not only treated them and guided them well but also advice me how to handle the situation. Post that throughout the consultation she answered all my queries and was available as a rock solid support. She guided my mother abt my nutrition care excerises and all precautions to be taken through my nine months which is very good fact about her. Patient and family both play important roles. She also dealt my complications of multiple fibroids very supportively and helped my baby come into the world safely along with health. Loved the way she handled me through this journey and I strongly recommend her.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words
